News from Representative Bobby Scott About Bobby Contact Services Legislation 3rd District March 1, 2023 Dear , Introducing the PRO Act - A Bill to Protect Workers' Right to Organize Yesterday, I joined a bipartisan group of Members of Congress to introduce the Richard L Trumka Protecting the Right to Organize (PRO) Act of 2023 (HR 20) , a comprehensive proposal to protect workers' right to come together and bargain for higher wages, better benefits, and safer workplaces. On Tuesday, Congressman Scott spoke at a press conference for the unveiling of the PRO Act.

?This #TeacherAppreciationWeek, [[user]] joined me for a visit to Bethel High School and Hampton University. We heard from educators, students, and administrators on how our historic investments in education are making a difference for them. [[url]]

News from Representative Bobby Scott About Bobby Contact Services Legislation 3rd District January 20, 2023 Dear , Today should mark 50 years since Roe v. Wade was first decided -- a momentous decision that guaranteed all women the right to control their own bodies. But half a century after Roe , our daughters and granddaugthers are at risk of growing up with fewer rights than we did.
